properties.entry: SELECT USER_FILE_RENAME , NICKNAME , POST_FILE_RENAME , POST_CONTENT , PCOM_CONTENT FROM MEMBER M JOIN POST_FILE ON ( M.USER_NO = POST_FILE.POST_NO) JOIN POST ON (M.USER_NO = POST.USER_NO) JOIN POST_COMMENT ON ( M.USER_NO = POST_COMMENT.USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND POST_CONTENT LIKE '집들이%'
SELECT NICKNAME , PCOM_CONTENT FROM MEMBER M JOIN POST_COMMENT ON (M.USER_NO = POST_COMMENT.USER_NO)
